effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect_entries.short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Steals 1/2 of the
damage inflicted.

Steals 1/2 of the
damage inflicted.

An attack that steals half
the damage inflicted.

An attack that steals half
the damage inflicted.

A harsh attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

A nutrient-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

des dégâts infligés en PV.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s

taken by the target.

ようぶんを　すいとり　こうげきする。
あたえた　ダメージの
はんぶんの　ＨＰを　かいふく　できる。

양분을 흡수하여 공격한다.
입힌 데미지의 절반에 해당하는
HP를 회복할 수 있다.

Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts
infligés en PV pour le lanceur.

Das Ziel wird angegriffen und die Hälfte
des zugefügten Schadens dem Angreifer
als KP gutgeschrieben.

Un ataque que absorbe nutrientes. Quien lo usa
recupera la mitad de los PS del daño que produce.

Mossa che assorbe PS. Chi la usa recupera
una quantità di PS pari alla metà del danno inferto.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

養分を　吸い取り　攻撃する。
与えた　ダメージの
半分の　ＨＰを　回復できる。
